A copy from the minutes (dated 1777 September 24) regarding a Petition by John Williams, Chairman of the Committee of Charlotte County, and 85 other inhabitants, signed by John M. Kelson, Clerk, House of Assembly

Petition prays for assistance in their distress of being driven from their land by the enemy
